products.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Poppy Red - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new. The gentle weave sits in the background, but it's the homely red that really catches the eye. Matching to trinity (blackout) poppy red is all about taking the time to get the balance right.

products.title: Roma, Scarlet - Roller Blind
products.description: In cosy, eye-catching red, the roma scarlet is no wallflower. As rich in quality as it is in colour, this blind is a must-have for red enthusiasts looking for a durable window covering for their home. Use the scarlet to offset rich cream walls for a cosy look in the living room. Add natural beiges, fellow reds, and even more cream to keep the look simple yet effective, and be sure to add plenty of wood for a wonderfully homely feel.

A versatile fabric, carnival 15 fabrics are moisture-resistant, flame-retardant and anti-allergen coated, and is available in several fabulous, saturated colours. This sunshine yellow electric roller adds a bright splash of colour to your window, evoking feelings of positivity and warm summer days. At swiftdirectblinds, quality is important to us, so not only does this roller blind made by their expert team and comes with customer-first service, we also provide a five-year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Roma, Persian Pastel - Roller Blind
products.description: In perfect purple, the roma in persian pastel is a simple yet unusual blind. A distinctive choice of colour, purple is usually seen in deep, eye-catching shades, yet this has a more understated look to it that might appeal even to those who aren't usually purple enthusiasts. Team the persian pastel with pale dove greys and keep the look simple yet attractive. Include stripes or checks for a contemporary look, or pretty florals for a more elegant and traditional style.

products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. products.title: Amor Rouge Roller Blind
products.description: A bold, commanding crimson, the amor rouge is so luxuriously rich that you will need a prenup before installing it. Being a bit of a diva, the rouge's darker red tone works much better in more neutral environments where it can really stand out and steal the show. Perfectly complimenting white, grey and beige walls, feel free to hang it up in any room you need extra some extra class. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Boysenberry Roller Blind
products.description: This gorgeous purple is what you would imagine the king of the aubergines to be. Royal and dignified, but with a restraint that shows his benevolence, he is the most beloved of all the vegetable kings. All his magnificence is present in this blind, from the rich colour that diplomatically cooperates with a variety of palette and decor designs to the steadfast defense of his realm from harsh sunlight that fades sofas and melts ice cream.

products.title: Kerry Fresh Strawberry Roller Blind
products.description: The colour you see when you get cut off at an intersection, the gorgeous kerry fresh strawberry is a physical manifestation of that burning anger that just feels so damn good. Ideal for rooms rocking warm colours, like other reds, oranges and browns, you could also use it to heat up a cooler colour palette and add some fire to your life. Being blackout as well, it gives you total darkness and privacy as you smash lamps and write angry reviews of restaurants on yelp.

products.title: Gibson Persian Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, teal blue coloured gibson persian blue would work brilliantly against a neutral background to help highlight the colour in this blind. This is a beautiful colour and great for anyone looking for a teal roller blind. Use this blind to lift and enhance a room - especially a bathroom as this 100% waterproof fabric can withstand anything thrown at it. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Anthology, Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology fired earth is a rich symphony of terracotta reds and calming whites that catches your eye the moment you walk in the room. The intricacy is what brings the fabric to life, and it's what will enable you to weave in half a dozen matching textures without crowding your space. We love the idea of using fired earth in the kitchen alongside some matching tiling and worktops. You could then paint the units a light graphite grey for a natural colour match you won't see anywhere else.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interiors. The reds and oranges are finely tempered by the strands of white that intricately weave their way through the fabric. Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed.

products.title: Saphira, Berry - Roller Blind
products.description: Our saphira berry fabric gives you a touch of natural inspiration, married in perfect harmony to a selection of lively colours that will bring any space to life. It's all about losing yourself in the moment, and standing back to admire the artisan skill that goes into creating it. If you want to build a theme around berry, you need to allow yourself to get creative with your use of little pockets of colour.
